column5: 3 minute drive to Mopac and 15 minutes to Downtown, close to Bike Trails and Lady Bird Johnson's Bird Park. My place is a 5 minute walk to boutique-style Escarpment Village Shopping with grocery, a Starbucks, higher end dining, or grab an ice cream or burger.  Youâ€™ll enjoy the coziness of the private master bedroom, private bath, and French door entry to the sun room, with view of beautiful trees in backyard. My place is great for couples, solo adventurers, or business travelers.
